scenes.description: A tense dramatic scene where Nerissa confronts IRyS about a perceived betrayal.

subtitles.original: Tell me.
subtitles.english: Tell me.

subtitles.original: Do you still love me?
subtitles.english: Do you still love me?

subtitles.original: What? Yes, of course!
subtitles.english: What? Yes, of course!

subtitles.original: Then why do you lie to me?
subtitles.english: Then why do you lie to me?

subtitles.original: I... I'm not lying, Nerissa!
subtitles.english: I... I'm not lying, Nerissa!

subtitles.original: Enough!
subtitles.english: Enough!

subtitles.original: You of all people should understand that a witch
subtitles.english: You of all people should understand that a witch

subtitles.original:
wouldn't be able to resist the power in my book
and attempt to bind me.
subtitles.english:
wouldn't be able to resist the power in my book
and attempt to bind me.

subtitles.original: And you can hardly expect me to believe that you,
subtitles.english: And you can hardly expect me to believe that you,

subtitles.original:
one of both planes, didn't know of the witch's
connection to such a famed warrior.
subtitles.english:
one of both planes, didn't know of the witch's
connection to such a famed warrior.

subtitles.original: This wasn't an attempt to free me.
subtitles.english: This wasn't an attempt to free me.

subtitles.original: This...
subtitles.english: This...

subtitles.original: This was an attempt to kill me.
subtitles.english: This was an attempt to kill me.

subtitles.original: To be free of me, to do what the gods couldn't.
subtitles.english: To be free of me, to do what the gods couldn't.

subtitles.original: Get back!
subtitles.english: Get back!

subtitles.original: Nerissa, that's not true. You don't understand.
subtitles.english: Nerissa, that's not true. You don't understand.

subtitles.original: Please give me some time to explain.
subtitles.english: Please give me some time to explain.

subtitles.original: But not here. Death is coming for you.
subtitles.english: But not here. Death is coming for you.

subtitles.original: We have to go.
subtitles.english: We have to go.

subtitles.original: I'm not going anywhere with you.
subtitles.english: I'm not going anywhere with you.

subtitles.original:
Nerissa! Surely by now Kiara's soul
has arrived before Death.
subtitles.english:
Nerissa! Surely by now Kiara's soul
has arrived before Death.

subtitles.original: And once Death finds out that you are free again...
subtitles.english: And once Death finds out that you are free again...

subtitles.original: We don't have much time. We have to go. Now!
subtitles.english: We don't have much time. We have to go. Now!

subtitles.original: Please, Nerissa!
subtitles.english: Please, Nerissa!

subtitles.original: No! I don't believe you.
subtitles.english: No! I don't believe you.

subtitles.original: You've broken my spirit.
subtitles.english: You've broken my spirit.

subtitles.original:
To learn that my followers no longer love me
was one thing.
subtitles.english:
To learn that my followers no longer love me
was one thing.

subtitles.original: But to discover that my closest
subtitles.english: But to discover that my closest

subtitles.original: and most loyal friend has betrayed me...
subtitles.english: and most loyal friend has betrayed me...

subtitles.original: ...tried to kill me, and no longer loves me too.
subtitles.english: ...tried to kill me, and no longer loves me too.

subtitles.original: If you no longer wish to give me your love,
subtitles.english: If you no longer wish to give me your love,

subtitles.original: then I... will take it.
subtitles.english: then I... will take it.

subtitles.original: Missing Promise
subtitles.english: Missing Promise

subtitles.original: Lyrics: hotaru  Music: 半田 翼
subtitles.english: Lyrics: hotaru  Music: Tsubasa Handa

subtitles.original: 遠ざかり始めた
subtitles.english: Has begun to recede

subtitles.original: その背中はもう振り返らない
subtitles.english: That back of yours already won't look back

subtitles.original: 長い夜が明けても
subtitles.english: Even if the long night ends

subtitles.original: 過ちと罪は今もずっと消えずに
subtitles.english: Mistakes and sins still won't ever disappear

subtitles.original: 落ちる夕陽 闇が忍び寄り
subtitles.english: The setting sun, darkness creeping in

subtitles.original: 黒く染まってく現実
subtitles.english: A reality turning black

subtitles.original: 想うほどに どうして傷つけ試した
subtitles.english: Why did I hurt and test you as much as I cared?

subtitles.original: 欲しかったのは ただ光射す
subtitles.english: What I wanted was just that sunlit

subtitles.original: その笑顔なのに
subtitles.english: smile

subtitles.original: 何度間違い続けた日々を
subtitles.english: As if untying and retying

subtitles.original: ほどいて結び直すように
subtitles.english: the days I kept making mistakes

subtitles.original: 迷っても愛にいくよ
subtitles.english: I'll go to love even if I'm lost

subtitles.original: 哀しい涙は拭って
subtitles.english: Wiping away sad tears

subtitles.original: いつの間にか忘れていた
subtitles.english: Searching for that gentle voice

subtitles.original: その優しい声を探して
subtitles.english: I'd forgotten before I knew it

subtitles.original: また手を取り合えたなら
subtitles.english: If we could hold hands again

subtitles.original: 君ともう一度約束を
subtitles.english: I'd make a promise with you once more

subtitles.original: 途切れそうな可能性
subtitles.english: Chasing the possibility that's about to break

subtitles.original: 見失わないように追いかけて
subtitles.english: So I don't lose sight of it

subtitles.original: 手に入れたものなら
subtitles.english: If it's something I obtained

subtitles.original: 理想とは違う どこか欠けた愛情
subtitles.english: It's different from the ideal, a love lacking something

subtitles.original: 怒り 嘆き 歪めたまま
subtitles.english: Anger, grief, distorted as they are

subtitles.original: ぶつけ合う逆さまの言葉
subtitles.english: We hurl inverted words at each other

subtitles.original: 想うほどに どうして許せなかった
subtitles.english: Why couldn't I forgive you as much as I cared?

subtitles.original: 守りたかった 笑顔を
subtitles.english: I wanted to protect your smile

subtitles.original: 気づけば壊して
subtitles.english: But I realized I'd broken it

subtitles.original: たとえすれ違い離れてても
subtitles.english: Even if we pass each other by and drift apart

subtitles.original: 君を信じられたなら
subtitles.english: If I could have believed in you

subtitles.original: また会える日が来たかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if the day we meet again would've come

subtitles.original: 二人の懐かしい顔で
subtitles.english: With our nostalgic faces

subtitles.original: 何気なく過ごしていた
subtitles.english: If I look back on those times

subtitles.original: あの時を思い返すなら
subtitles.english: we spent casually

subtitles.original: ありのまま伝えあえてた
subtitles.english: We could've told each other things as they were

subtitles.original: まるで運命のように
subtitles.english: Just like destiny

subtitles.original: 無くしたものかも 戻らないこと
subtitles.english: Even if I know that what I've lost

subtitles.original: 分かっていても
subtitles.english: might not come back

subtitles.original: 願いをかけること 辞められはしない
subtitles.english: I won't ever stop making a wish

subtitles.original: いつか どれほど大切な
subtitles.english: Every time my chest aches

subtitles.original: 人だったのか 胸が苦しむ度に
subtitles.english: I'll know how important a person you were one day

subtitles.original: 知った
subtitles.english: I'll know

subtitles.original: 共に過ごした日を
subtitles.english: The days we spent together
